name: Ragnarok RTS
description:
Ragnarok is a viking-themed old-school style RTS reminiscent of games like Age of Empires and starcraft. Currently there is a functioning single player mode with 15 gradually increasing difficulty levels. There are currently two maps and up to 3 AIs alongside the player. There is also a working direct-ip connect multiplayer lobby.

Use the left mouse button to select units and right click to issue orders.

Music by Bensounds.org
